column4: hey guys, is there an easy place to view the environment variables?
I'm trying to set $CLASSPATH, but if I export the values to it in one terminal window, it isn't saved for any others...
you either export it in your .bash_profile or .bashrc for it to affect all new created shells.
exports from one shell do not affect others shells just the childen processes of that shell
